title: PBE
body: Its been over a year and riot still hasn't accepted me into PBE. They have reworked my main, I have never been banned and i've sent a support ticket but they just said that I needed to wait and they select testers based on the champs they are working on. Even though I waited and they reworked my main still haven't been accepted.

replies.body:
There isn't one pure acceptance criteria of how you get into the PBE.  Essentially, it is essentially at random every time there is a new "cycle" on the PBE.  If you haven't been chosen yet, it isn't because there is some grand conspiracy against you, it just means you haven't been chosen yet :(

I hope this makes sense!  Let me know if you have any other questions!

Hi, i recently set up to join the PBE i am already an Alpha tester and would like to progress with helping the riot team, how can i check any progress as to the PBE whether it be acceptance into it or just casual updates?
